thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Mrs Oonagh Connolly
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Mrs Oonagh Connolly

author: Mrs Oonagh Connolly
title: Mrs Oonagh Connolly
text:
I ordered online and I was very happy about the next day delivery, although the trainers I ordered for my son were too small, I was able to exchange or get a refund in my local Lifestyle store which was so handy.
I would definitely recommend to friends :)
